original_text: Forty and two years old was Ahaziah when he began to reign, and he reigned one year in Jerusalem. His mother's name also was Athaliah the daughter of Omri.
korean_text: 아하시야가 왕이 될 때에 나이가 사십이 세라 예루살렘에서 일 년 동안 다스리니라 그의 어머니의 이름은 아달랴요 오므리의 손녀더라

sentences.original_text: Forty and two years old was Ahaziah
and he reigned one year in Jerusalem
His mother's name also was Athaliah
